text:
on for Advanced Chronic Kidney Disease in Adults
What to do for Nutrition for Advanced Chronic Kidney Disease in Adults ?,"- A person may prevent or delay some health problems from chronic kidney disease (CKD) by eating the right foods and avoiding foods high in sodium, potassium, and phosphorus.  - The kidneys remove wastes and extra water from the blood and make urine.  - Medical nutrition therapy (MNT) is the use of counseling by a registered dietitian to help promote a medical or health goal
